Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.gods

Class God

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.gods.God
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Minotaur, Mortal, Pan, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
    public class God
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A generic God class. A god could have special powers that could change the behavior of all Builder controlled by the player bound to the God instance. or change his win condition. A god has his MoveBehavior, his BuildBehavior, his WinCondition. A god could also have a special start power and a special build phase power
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • God

        public God​(java.lang.String name,
           WinCondition winCondition,
           MoveBehavior moveBehavior,
           BuildBehavior buildBehavior,
           boolean specialStartPower,
           boolean specialBuildPower)
        The Constructor of the class. It creates a God Object with specific characteristics
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the God
        winCondition - The effect it has on the Winning Condition of the game
        moveBehavior - The MoveBehavior parameter. It could either be a Standard one or a Decorator one
        buildBehavior - The BuildBehavior parameter. It could either be a Standard one or a Decorator one
        specialStartPower - The parameter that specifies if it has a Starting Special Power
        specialBuildPower - The parameter that specifies if it has a Special Build Power

      • God

        public God​(God god)
        Parameters:
        god - is a God we want to copy
